Enter the application name. No \'.xml\', only the name!\n (Change requires restart) Leave empty to use folder named \'backup\' under project folder Export and backup files are saved to this folder. If you leave the field empty, the files will be stored under \'backup\' in your project folder. Location of all configuration files Folder for configuration files Local Configuration
Loads configuration from project folder in file system
Field Pad is an app for collection of earth data in the field. It is configured using a bundle of control files. An optional back-end can be used to sync collected data between team members." We are a software house that started out serving the environmental science community, with functionality for collecting data about species in the field. "We’d love to hear about your data collection experiences. Information about problems you’ve seen and suggestions for improvements are key to making Field Pad even better." FEEDBACK Hide details Details Contact us Start Continue Erase all cached files to force reload Reset Cache "This will erase all cached images and configuration files. Are you sure?" files deleted from cache Scan QR If you have received settings via a QR code, you can scan it here Determines granularity of information shown in log "App is ready to run. 'About' page for details" "Continue" "The FieldPad version you have installed is too old for this bundle. The required FieldPad version is " Warning ". Fieldpad will try to use an older version of the XML if you click Continue but this may lead to errors.">
